description: Non-Supine RDI at 2% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 2% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrop + hnrop + carop + canop + oarop + oanop ) / ( remepop + nremepop )

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-Supine RDI at 0% oxygen desaturation
